t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia

Amazon Brand Registry Spain: Protect and build your brand
s: Start your brand’s Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.

t: Amazon to settle lawsuit alleging it stole drivers' tips to save labor costs | Fox Business
s: Amazon will pay $3.95 million to settle a lawsuit claiming that it diverted the tips its Flex drivers received to pay for the employees' base wages.
